question: Which among the following formulated a Dominion Status Constitution for India?
explanation: An all Parties Conference was held from 28th August to 31st August 1928 with the chairmanship of Motilal Nehru in Lucknow. In the conference, Motilal Nehru presented the draft of the constitution. It is known as the Nehru report. Dominion Status for India was demanded through this report. Later on 28th March 1929, Md. Ali Jinnah demanded his 14 points in the conference of Muslim League in Delhi.
